
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is either an integer equal to the current year or a `Date` object representing the current year.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    out: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is the current year.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new Date() )
    true
    > var currentYear = require( '@stdlib/time-current-year' )
    > bool = {{alias}}( currentYear() )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( 2021 )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( null )
    false


    See Also
    --------
    {{alias:@stdlib/time-current-year}}
